column4: hi i have a question about samba.. how can i secure the file in samba and limit the space of the folder. can anyone here provide me a help.......
hi i have a question about samba.. how can i secure the file in samba and limit the space of the folder. can anyone here provide me a help.......
man chmod; man chown; easiest is to: chmod 700 file, so only you can read/write it.
